name: Bluestone's Awakening
description:
A game about a blue blob doing some nice things for his colorful blob friends on a rainy day. As well as avoiding some weird creature who's bent on destruction and phases through walls, but that's besides the point. Can you deliver all 5 gifts to your friends and escape the cave-castle-thing?

Controls:
  • Left/Right: Move
  • Z: Jump
  • X: Grab/release items
  • Down: Hide behind held item (Only if not moving)
Tips:
  • The rain is quite useful for the erosion of rocks.
  • You can hide behind held items by pressing down while you're not walking. This way, you won't get caught!
  • If you jump while hiding, you are still safe, so try to jump out of tricky situations!
Meet the cast!
  • Bluestone: You! A blob who likes giving things to others.
  • Redstone: A blob who likes hats. Not very interested in sports.
  • Orangestone: A blob who likes fruit. Prefers smaller fruit.
  • Yellowstone: A blob who likes beverages. Has never used a straw.
  • Greenstone: A blob who likes nature. Has never taken chemistry.
  • Indigostone: A blob who likes math. Not very good at solving equations.
  • Violetstone: We don't talk about Violetstone. No one does. Don't do it.
  • Ert7+:  A something which likes nothing. Has a nice, big smile at all times.
